title: Jax
description: You met Jax is Neveah A Broken Forever and quickly learned that he's a wicked and dangerous man. Now, learn Jax's story. How did Jax Androni, a boy with a special gift and promising future transform into the sexy but despicable Jax Bane. Follow as this story chronicles his early friendship with Annika Levannah and what happened that made him snap, from his point of view. This is a Neveah short story.
author: Angie Merriam
